title: Unable to unlock skin after buying champion
body: I had rerolled 3 skin shards a while back and I got Phoenix Quinn, even though I didn't own Quinn at the time. Now, I have enough IP to buy Quinn. I bought her, and then went to loot to unlock the skin. But kept getting the message that the servers weren't able to process the transaction. The severs were good from the status page, so I wonder if it's a bug?

replies.body: We believe this should be resolved now!  Can you try again and let us know?
